name: Madman
overview: Madman is an interesting take on Pong/Breakout (the came plays like a cross between both of those two games. It's like breakout in that you have bricks (well in this case balls) to destroy, but it's also like Pong in that you have an AI opponent competing against you. This game was developed by Alan W, Gardner and published in both Loadtar #004 and later in Loadstar #249
